title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.8 - Development of the single application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.8 - Development of the single application

State Regulations

Local educational agencies applying for funds under title IV
of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act will be required to submit only
one application for such funds for any one fiscal year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2302.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
